scripts.build:assets: cd ../ui && NODE_END=production PLATFORM=desktop BUILD_DIR=../desktop/dist yarn run nuxt build
scripts.build:macos: yarn build:assets && electron-packager dist --platform darwin --asar --overwrite --out app --arch x64 --icns assets/images/icon.icns
scripts.build:linux: yarn build:assets && electron-packager dist --platform linux  --asar --overwrite --out app --arch x64
scripts.dev: USE_LOCAL_MOCK_GITHUB_SERVER=1 concurrently --kill-others 'yarn run renderer' 'yarn run main'
scripts.renderer: cd ../ui && NODE_ENV=development PLATFORM=desktop PORT=9080 yarn dev
